Name: GUN KING
About the game: Survive an endless horde of enemies for 20 minutes! Discover New Builds Every Run In this bullet heaven survival game, level up to select from unique upgrade trees to mix and match a variety of upgrades to create your very own build. Select Your Gun Choose from a variety of guns that offer a variety of gameplay experiences. Features Over 60 different upgrades you can choose from to create your very own build! Over 14 guns, with more to come post-launch. Gun specific upgrades to vary gameplay / builds. Fast-paced casual 10-20 minute play sessions.
